modName: Summon Craft tools - Smithing cooking enchanting and alchemy anywhere
summary:
Summons Cooking Pot, Cooking Spit, Oven, Alchemy Lab, Arcane Enchanter, Anvil, Grindstone, Armor Workbench, Smith Forge, Smelter, Tanning Rack, Skyforge, Pickaxe, and Woodcutter's axe in any convenient location.
You can find the "Summon Craft tools" spell tome near Riverwood Alvors house. See screenshots.
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][color=#008800][b]Adds new spell - "Summon Craft tools".[/b][/color][/size]

In general, the spell allows you to put Cooking Pot, Cooking Spit, Oven (v 2.0), Alchemy Lab, Arcane Enchanter, Anvil, Grindstone, Armor
Workbench, Smith Forge, Smelter, Tanning Rack, Skyforge, Pickaxe (v
2.0), and woodcutter's axe (v 2.0) anywhere.
You can place only one copy of all the items, in v 1.0.

Warning!
HearthFires requred for v 2.0.
In v 2.0 by clicking "Remove nearest" you can remove objects that were originally in the game.
(Script sources included)

[color=#008800][b]Installation:[/b][/color]

Unpack and copy the contents of the compressed ZIP file into your Skyrim game folder, into the 'Data' folder (esm and bsa files). Using the 'vanilla game launcher' tool, click on the 'Data' button and make sure there is a check mark in front of this mod. This will activate the mod in your game. Now load the game up and your now done.

You can find the "Summon Craft tools" spell tome near Riverwood Alvors house. See screenshots.

[b][color=#008800]troubleshooting[/color][/b]

If you have an older version, I recommend to do the following:
Cast spell and select "Remove all" before placing new objects.

If you can not find or lose the spell tome, you can add a spell through the console.
To do this in the console, type "help Summon".
Now find the ID of Summon Craft tools (will be something hh000D66).
Type in the console "player.addspell ID" (player.addspell hh000D66).

[color=#008800][b]Endorse me if You like my work![/b][/color]
[color=#008800]Thanks![/color]
[color=#008800]Please credit me for all my files you use.[/color]
author: ShooD

Now you can summon all posible ingame craft tools.
